revised_title: Sound Propagation in Parallel Sheared Flows in Ducts: Mode Estimation and Amplitude
tldr: This article investigates the propagation of sound in a two-dimensional duct with a steady parallel sheared flow. It provides explicit expressions for the amplitudes of sound modes associated with the discrete wavenumber spectrum generated upstream and downstream of a specified source distribution. The study also introduces a new approach to non-classical eigenvalue problems, combining elements of residue theory and Sturm-Liouville theory.
